arts.ttl: Arne Slot Slams Reveals What He Told Hugo Ekitike After Red Card in Liverpool vs Southampton
arts.sum: Slot didn't hold back - he said exactly what was on his mind.

arts.ttl: Alexander Isak continues Newcastle tradition after first Liverpool goal vs Southampton
arts.sum: Alexander Isak scored his first Liverpool goal in the Carabao Cup third round clash against Southampton and the Sweden striker was able to celebrate in familiar fashion

arts.ttl: Liverpool Player Ratings vs. Southampton: Isak Announces Himself in 2-1 Win

While Arne Slot made a host of changes to his starting lineup looking to keep legs fresh in a busy start to the season, Alexander Isak, Rio Ngumoha and Jeremie Frimpong all were on the pitch to start.

arts.ttl: The games Hugo Ekitike will miss for Liverpool after 'sheer stupidity' vs Southampton
Hugo Ekitike issues apology to Liverpool fans after red card in Southampton win
arts.sum: Liverpool striker Hugo Ekitike has shared an apology to Liverpool fans on his Instagram story after being sent off in their Carabao Cup triumph over Southampton

arts.ttl: Forget Alexander Isak, Liverpool summer signing with 97 percent pass accuracy was the real deal vs Southampton
arts.sum: He was brilliant on his debut.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 2-1 Southampton: Isak scores first Liverpool goal as Ekitike sent off for winning celebration
arts.sum: But 42 minutes later, he was perhaps the least admired after an inept outward pass intended for Joshua Quarshie was snatched by Federico Chiesa, who directed the ball towards the former Newcastle United striker, waiting to pounce, as he converted from seven yards for his first goal for Liverpool. McCarthy was Southamptonâ€™s most appreciated player after only 44 seconds when he denied Isak an early goal by jutting his right hand towards the Sweden internationalâ€™s first shot of the game.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 2-1 Southampton: Alexander Isak scores his first Reds goal before Hugo Ekitike is sent off for celebrating late winner - as Arne Slot's side limp through with narrow win
arts.sum: LIVERPOOL 2-1 SOUTHAMPTON - DOMINIC KING AT ANFIELD: Isak's eyes were wide and his smile was disbelieving as he walked towards Anfield's tunnel but was stopped.
